entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy late this evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 8:05 PM CDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High 9.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 30 km/h late in the afternoon. High 9. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 8:05 PM CDT Monday 17 April 2023
